      jpo.XmlDistiller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class XmlDistiller
extends java.lang.Thread

a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file

XmlDistiller

XmlDistiller(java.io.File outputFile,
             SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode startNode,
             boolean copyPics,
             boolean runAsThread)
Parameters:
outputFile - The name of the file that is to be created
startNode - The node from which this is all to be built.
copyPics - Flag which instructs pictures to be copied too
runAsThread - Flag which can instruct this job not to run as a thread.
